APP_STORE_CONNECT_API_KEY_ID.description: ID da chave API do App Store Connect

APP_STORE_CONNECT_ISSUER_ID.description: Issuer ID da sua conta do App Store Connect
APP_STORE_CONNECT_ISSUER_ID.instructions: App Store Connect > Users and Access > Keys > Copie o Issuer ID

APP_STORE_CONNECT_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Chave privada do App Store Connect (arquivo .p8)
APP_STORE_CONNECT_PRIVATE_KEY.instructions: Faça upload do arquivo AuthKey_5D79LKKR26.p8 no Xcode Cloud

DEVELOPMENT_TEAM.description: Team ID do Apple Developer Program
DEVELOPMENT_TEAM.instructions: Apple Developer Portal > Account > Membership > Team ID

EXPO_TOKEN.description: Token do Expo para builds automatizados

NODE_ENV.description: Ambiente Node.js para builds de produção
